title: Tactical Device Mode
description: Tactical device mode disables all cellular communications including emergency 911 services.  The device user will not be able to turn off Airplane Mode or make emergency calls.

title: Auto-Adjust Touch Sensitivity
description: This feature switches ON or OFF the touch sensitivity functionality in the device settings.

title: Automatic Hotspot 2.0 Connectivity
description: Controls whether the device is allowed to automatically connect to Hotspot 2.0 Wi-Fi networks.

title: Disable RAM Plus Feature
description: Controls whether the Samsung feature called RAM Plus is enabled or disabled.  It is recommended to leave this disabled as enabling the feature has device performance costs.

title: Enable Randomized MAC Address
description: Controls whether the Wi-Fi MAC address is randomized or the actual hardware assigned MAC.  It is higher security to use a randomized MAC address but you may need to disable this for some configuration scenarios.

title: LTE Band Locking
description: Lock the LTE band to the value specified provided the HW supports the band passed
